##### Postgraduate Programmes Offered

The Faculty of Artificial Intelligence at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia offers a range of postgraduate coursework programs across various fields, providing advanced instruction and research opportunities tailored to students’ interests and career goals. Our programs boast a diverse faculty of renowned experts and industry professionals, ensuring students receive high-quality education and mentorship. Additionally, students benefit from state-of-the-art facilities, cutting-edge research resources, and a vibrant academic community, fostering a dynamic learning environment conducive to intellectual growth and innovation.

##### Postgraduate Programmes Offered

The Faculty of Artificial Intelligence at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia offers a comprehensive array of postgraduate research programs spanning various fields, enabling students to pursue advanced studies and contribute to cutting-edge research in their areas of interest. Our programs are designed to provide students with exceptional instruction, mentorship, and research opportunities, empowering them to explore novel concepts, develop innovative solutions, and make meaningful contributions to their respective fields. With access to state-of-the-art facilities, research resources, and a supportive academic community, students are equipped with the tools and environment needed to thrive in their research endeavors and advance knowledge in artificial intelligence and related disciplines.

##### Postgraduate Programme Offered

The Faculty of Artificial Intelligence at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia offers doctoral programs across diverse fields, providing students with the opportunity to pursue advanced research and scholarship at the highest level. Our doctoral programs are characterized by rigorous academic instruction, personalized mentorship, and extensive research opportunities, allowing students to delve deeply into their chosen areas of specialization and contribute original insights to the field of artificial intelligence and related disciplines. With access to cutting-edge facilities, research resources, and a supportive academic community, doctoral students are empowered to conduct groundbreaking research and emerge as leaders in their respective fields, poised to make significant contributions to academia, industry, and society.

[![](https://fai.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/3d-rendering-biorobots-concept-1.jpg)](https://fai.utm.my/doctor-of-engineering-in-engineering-business-management/)
